Description_lang: Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes $?a137011[$441812s1][$451177s1] damage over $441812d and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by $?a137011[$441812s2][$451177s2]%.Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death. $?a137011[If a Dreadful Wound benefiting from Tiger's Fury is re-applied, the new Dreadful Wound deals damage as if Tiger's Fury was active.][]

description_blz.en_US:
Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes 242 damage over 6 sec and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by 10%.

Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death.
description_blz.es_MX:
Devastar también aplica un sangrado que inflige 242 p. de daño durante 6 s y quita fuerza a sus víctimas, lo que reduce un 10% el daño que te infligen.

Herida atroz no se ve afectada por Círculo de la vida y la muerte.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Assolar também aplica um Sangramento que causa 242 de dano ao longo de 6 s e rouba a força da vítima, reduzindo em 10% o dano que a vítima causa a você.

Ferida Medonha não é afetada pelo Círculo de Vida e Morte.
description_blz.de_DE:
'Verheeren' verursacht außerdem eine Blutung, die im Verlauf von 6 Sek. 242 Schaden verursacht und Opfern die Stärke entzieht, wodurch diese Euch 10% weniger Schaden zufügen.

'Grausame Wunde' wird nicht von 'Kreislauf aus Leben und Tod' beeinflusst.
description_blz.en_GB:
Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes 242 damage over 6 sec and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by 10%.

Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death.
description_blz.es_ES:
Devastar también causa una hemorragia que inflige 242 p. de daño durante 6 s y mina la fuerza de sus víctimas, lo que reduce un 10% el daño que te infligen.

Herida espantosa no se ve afectada por El ciclo de vida y muerte.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Ravage applique également un saignement qui inflige 242 points de dégâts en 6 s et réduit la force de ses victimes, ce qui réduit les dégâts qu’elles vous infligent de 10 %.

Blessure effroyable n’est pas affectée par Cycle de la vie et la mort.
description_blz.it_IT:
Devastazione provoca anche un sanguinamento che infligge 242 danni in 6 s e fiacca la forza della vittima, riducendone i danni a te inflitti del 10%.

Ferita Atroce non viene modificata da Circolo della Vita e della Morte.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Способность "Терзание" также вызывает кровотечение, которое наносит 242 ед. урона за 6 сек. и лишает жертву сил, уменьшая урон, который она наносит вам, на 10%.

На "Чудовищную рану" не действует "Круг жизни и смерти".
description_blz.ko_KR:
찢어발기기가 추가로 출혈을 일으켜 6초에 걸쳐 242의 피해를 입히고 대상이 힘을 잃게 해 자신에게 입히는 피해를 10%만큼 감소시킵니다.

섬뜩한 상처는 생사의 순환에 영향을 받지 않습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
劫掠也會施加流血效果，在6秒內造成242點傷害，並削弱受害者的力氣，使其對你造成的傷害降低10%。

致命重傷不受生死循環影響。
description_blz.zh_CN:
毁灭还会施加流血，在6秒内造成242点伤害，同时削弱目标的力量，使其对你造成的伤害降低10%。

恐惧创痕不会受到生死循环影响。
